projectDescription: Data science time series analysis, modeling and webscraping of True Achievements website. Demonstrates ability to create interactive dashboards and time series and forecasting skills.

Machine learning project that predicts the demographics of an OkCupid dating profile based on different profile prompt question responses using the Naive Bayes algorithm. Demonstrates familiarity with NLP.
Demonstrates exploratory data analysis skills using data from world energy. Utilizes Python and Shiny to create a simple data driven application.
Demonstrates basics of web frameworks in a front-end focus using Blazor and C#. Utilizes Razor components and ability to deploy a simple application.
